title: marios22558
author: marios22558
content: i need 500 emails sent daily and payment is 150 dailycontact me telegram  +35799901599

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Can you tell us that how will you pay the users who work for you? Are you going to pay them half money in advance and half when job is completed or you're going to pay them when they complete the job? I'm quite sure that you will choose the 2nd option because that way you'll get your work done and you won't pay the ones who have completed your work.You already have 2 red tags from the reputed members of the forum and I believe you should stop making such posts because no one will trust you or want to work with you. I don't believe that someone like you will even pay $1 for the hard work of sending 500 e-mails a day and anyone who works with you may get scammed.

comments.author: marios22558
comments.body: once 150 emails are sent 50 usd is  paid . then 150 50 usd is paid then 200 50 usd is paid.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: marios22558 on November 18, 2023, 08:04:54 PMonce 150 emails are sent 50 usd is  paid . then 150 50 usd is paid then 200 50 usd is paid. Are you going to pay the users with Bitcoin or something else? Because here in this forum the services board is mostly for Bitcoin payments and if someone doesn't pay with Bitcoin then such threads should not be posted here. I also want to know that what type of e-mails the user has to send because if the e-mail contain something illegal then the user might face troubles. I would also want to know that are you going to have a trusted escrow from this forum or you're going to send the money yourself because if you deposit some funds with a trusted escrow then people may still want to work for you.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: With the current condition of your account (who was tagged with negative feedback for not paying its hired people) you need at least escrow to hold the funds for their security and assurance that they will get the money after the work is complete and done. Or else you are just wasting time here.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.created_time: November 19, 2023, 01:26:15 AMLast edit: November 19, 2023, 03:14:20 AM by wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: There are too many complaints about this OP not been a reputable person, from the comments on his trust levels I got a link to a similar complaint by people who he offered jobs and refused to respond to their payment appeals and even to give reasons why he may not have paid.I'll advise him to come up and defend himself before anyone gets to become the next victim

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: marios22558 on November 18, 2023, 08:04:54 PMonce 150 emails are sent 50 usd is  paid . then 150 50 usd is paid then 200 50 usd is paid. Without specifying who owns these emails, @domain type, are they personal or commercial emails, how will you be sure of their quality, or whether you buy any email and the high price for it, all you will get is being defrauded.150 per day is considered higher than the average wage in many countries and higher than the minimum wage in most countries of the world.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: marios22558 on November 18, 2023, 08:04:54 PMonce 150 emails are sent 50 usd is  paid . then 150 50 usd is paid then 200 50 usd is paid. So you think that you will still be able to pay 50 USD ?Here that person is still waiting for this 50$ for many years now. Negative trust feedback and the flag against you are enough to prove that you are not a trustworthy person. No one should trust you for even 1 Dollar.  Quote from: mr_ROBOTT on August 07, 2021, 02:55:16 PMQuote from: marios22558 on August 07, 2021, 02:47:56 PMStill looking for hiresYou still owe me $ 50. Are you looking for a new person to cheat on?

comments.author: mushijapann
comments.body: Quote from: marios22558 on November 17, 2023, 09:23:19 PMi need 500 emails sent daily and payment is 150 dailycontact me telegram  +35799901599Hi sir good day to you.I badly need a homebased work, I have a 4 children 1,3,7,10 thats why i need a homebased work so that i can help me wife taking care of my kids because 2 of them are going to school everyday..  and i also live in philippines..I hope you will consider me to be your worker.Thank You

comments.author: vangordian
comments.body: Doesn't seem like you would get many takers for this. There's literally no security and after blasting out 300 emails, you may simply disappear. Are you willing to use an escrow?

comments.author: Iron Fist
comments.body: That's basically spamming people, which I don't support.  If you've got some real need to contact that many people, maybe you should rethink how you're doing it.  There's got to be better ways that don't involve bombarding inboxes.  I try to recommend services that actually respect privacy and dont just spam everyone.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: mushijapann on November 19, 2023, 03:21:22 AM-snip-I badly need a homebased work, I have a 4 children 1,3,7,10 thats why i need a homebased work so that i can help me wife taking care of my kids because 2 of them are going to school everyday..  and i also live in philippines..You can't expect this type of work to keep you at home. If you vurrently have a steady job outside, it's even better, believe me.Get a babysitter instead.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Given the negative trust in this account, I believe that any financial dealings with it will lead you to lose your money. it is better to avoid dealing with this scam account. I added negative trust and supported flag.No one is going to pay you $150 for 500 emails, it's too good to be true

comments.author: mushijapann
comments.body: Quote from: noorman0 on November 19, 2023, 08:39:44 AMQuote from: mushijapann on November 19, 2023, 03:21:22 AM-snip-I badly need a homebased work, I have a 4 children 1,3,7,10 thats why i need a homebased work so that i can help me wife taking care of my kids because 2 of them are going to school everyday..  and i also live in philippines..You can't expect this type of work to keep you at home. If you vurrently have a steady job outside, it's even better, believe me.Get a babysitter instead.I just realized upon checking his account i am familiar with his tricks..I used epicnpc before when i was active in gaming.
